## ResourceManager.getPropertyByName() method

Get a property accessor by its canonical path.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getPropertyByName(name: string): PropertyAccessor;
```

**Returns:**

[PropertyAccessor](doc/markdown/./scene.propertyaccessor.md)

The `PropertyAccessor`<!-- -->, or `null` if not found.

## Remarks

The canonical path format is `/ClassName/propName`<!-- -->.
